orchestrate_brain_tool.description: The AI-driven decision-making core of Orchestrate.

gmail_tool.description: Integrates with Gmail for sending, receiving, and managing emails.

spark_file_tool.description: Processes files using Apache Spark for large-scale data handling.

ideogram_tool.description: Generates images and artistic designs using Ideogram AI.

orchetstrate_workflow_tool.description: Orchestrates workflows for complex, multi-step automation.

airtable_tool.description: Interacts with Airtable for database-like spreadsheet management.

github_tool.description: Manages GitHub repositories, issues, and commits programmatically.

dropbox_tool.description: Handles file storage, retrieval, and organization in Dropbox.

mailjet_tool.description: Sends bulk emails and manages email campaigns via Mailjet.

orchestrate_workflow_tool.description: Defines workflow blueprints for Orchestrate, specifying which tools to use and in what sequence. It does not execute tasks but structures automated processes.

file_reader_tool.description: Reads, analyzes, and processes files locally without downloading.

curator_ninja.description: Curation tool for filtering and organizing relevant content.

roadmap_tool.description: Manages the Orchestrate roadmap, allowing features to be added, updated, and tracked in development.

podcast_cover_tool.description: Generates podcast cover art using background scripts and Photoshop JSX.

newsletter_ninja.description: Automates newsletter creation, formatting, and distribution.

orchestrate_recall.description: Persistent memory for Orchestrate—stores notes, context, and execution history across threads.

leonardo_tool.description: Generates high-quality AI images using Leonardo AI.

FileManager.description: Manages file operations including search, move, rename, duplicate, and delete.

install_tool.description: Installs tools from GitHub into Orchestrate.

mem_tool.description: No description provided. Please update this tool.
